name: Deli Direct Spread 'Um Aged Asiago Cheese Food, 45 oz

reviews.name: Deli Direct Spread 'Um Aged Asiago Cheese Food, 45 oz
reviews.reviewText: The Asiago cheese spread is great on crackers but I also put it on sandwiches. The company that makes the Asiago also makes several other cheese spreads, one of my other favorites is th Port Wine and cheese. Both are highly recommended. Happy munching!!
reviews.title: a special treat

reviews.name: Deli Direct Spread 'Um Aged Asiago Cheese Food, 45 oz
reviews.reviewText: Looks as advertised and comes in a protective cooler. It's a little pricey, but the taste is so good that you actually use less than block or sliced cheeses.
reviews.title: Great Taste

reviews.name: Deli Direct Spread 'Um Aged Asiago Cheese Food, 45 oz
reviews.reviewText: My 82 year old dad is Italian and loves Asiago cheese. I bought him 3 containers for Christmas. He was so happy, then he tasted it. He was in heaven. Believe it or not, this product really made his Christmas special. I tried it too and it was super delicious!
reviews.title: Asiago cheese lovers rejoice

reviews.name: Deli Direct Spread 'Um Aged Asiago Cheese Food, 45 oz
reviews.reviewText: Very delicious....wish it will be available at all Walmart store.
reviews.title: Asiago spread from Walmart

reviews.name: Deli Direct Spread 'Um Aged Asiago Cheese Food, 45 oz
reviews.reviewText: Surprisingly good for the price. Everyone enjoyed it! Intending on taking 1 container and Ritz crackers to family reunion. Shipping container was beyond excellent for keeping contents cold! Received within 2 days of order.
reviews.title: Excellent Taste! Smooth, Creamy Texture!
